StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [ChangePADD]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ContractId int, @PADD date.me, @LastEditBy varchar(50) ) AS
UPDATE CONTRACT SET PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE = @PADD, USER_LOGIN = @LastEditBy, UPDATE_DATE = GetDate() WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID
INSERT INTO PADD_HISTORY (CONTRACT_ID, PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE, PADD_CHANGED_DATE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@ContractID, @PADD, GetDate(), @LastEditBy, GetDate())
